text: Dmitri Nikolayevich Gadalov (; born 28 February 1973) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Association football defenders
title: Dmitri Gadalov
